name: Hikari no Shima: Seven Lithographs in Shining Island
overview: Hikari No Shima - Seven Lithograhs in Shining Island is an Action puzzle game set in a lost city in a strange island where the player has to solve different puzzles to advance to the next stage meanwhile he fights against different kind of monsters. In the game the player can use 3 different characters each one with different characteristics & abilities and to pass each stage he will need to use them: - Barron: He is a warrior. The first one can hit, throw things and place items - Furoi: He is a priest. Is the second character can read letters, combine items - Ashia: A bandit. Is the third character of the game and can examine places, pick up items and climb) The game features 25 stages to complete.
